snippet: Can you calculate the win percentages for two basketball coaches, then use those figures to predict the number of each coach's wins in a 30-game season?
abstract: Can you calculate the win percentages for two basketball coaches, then use those figures to predict the number of each coach's wins in a 30-game season?
lead_paragraph: Test your math skills with this question created by Pete Diamantis at Math for America from the article "With Victory No. 700 Comes a P.S.A.L. First."
